modName: Lush Forest Grasses And Ground Covers For Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3]This small and simple mod is a custom editedretexture and mesh replacer for Unique Grasses And Ground Covers I created for
myself some time ago and wanted to share it with others. I made this small mod
in an effort to improve my performance as well as preserving  the overall
quality and aesthetic of my Skyrim by by offering more variety on the types of
grasses you see in Skyrim's rich forests. In a real thriving forest environment
with populated species of different kinds of grass in which the wilderness area
has been undeveloped and unfounded you would find grasses that some would
call weeds and would grow unusually high. Skyrim landscapes were meant to
appear more harsh and forbidding imo. Although I'm not a botanist I'd like
to offer grasses with a little hint of realism

[img width=370,height=180]file:///C:/Users/unknown/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image001.png[/img]

However I  believe there's a limit on the types ofgrass Skyrim is able to only use, and so I combined various grasses into one
texture loading them with a larger mesh. It replaces most meshes with two
"lusher" mesh models I found in Skyrim's meshes folder. These meshes
also increase the amount of grass and ground cover you see per mesh. The mesh
models that Unique Grasses uses for it's grass and groundcover are small. 

Side by side comparison between the two [b]ground cover[/b] meshes  
                     
aspen leaf pile model               
                     
                     
    clover patch model

[img width=350,height=190]file:///C:/Users/unknown/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image002.png[/img]                  [img width=350,height=190]file:///C:/Users/unknown/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image003.png[/img]


Side by side comparison between the two [b]grass [/b]meshes

   grass model               
                     
                     
               reach bush model

[img width=340,height=180]file:///C:/Users/unknown/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image004.png[/img]                  [img width=340,height=180]file:///C:/Users/unknown/AppData/Local/Temp/msohtmlclip1/01/clip_image005.png[/img]


The models I use are more larger or "lush". Theyboth replace the grasses and groundcover found in the Pine Forest and The Rift.
The result is more grass covering more areas. This actually reduces the need to
increase the grass size in your Skyrim.ini leaving more space for more
performance. This mod is in efforts and aims to make grasses appear more dense,
diverse and performance friendly

Details

 When asked to overwrite UGG (NMM users: select"Yes to Mod") and do not use the plugin provided with UGG, use
Tamu75's Unique Grasses And Ground Cover Plugin and untick  "Unique
Grasses.esp" and keep "UGCustum.esp" plugin ticked in your load
order

Set * iMinGrassSize=100 in your Skyrim.ini, the higherthis value is the less grass you will see. 

 *This value is appropriate due to having a densemesh model loaded for every grass type, if this value is set way too low
  it can cause you to see much more grass andgrass clipping would be much more noticeable, and may cause performance 
  issues which goes against what I originallyintended for this mod to achieve which is the purpose of achieving better 
  performance, tweak this setting as youplease according to your needs

Regions Covered In My Mod

Pine Forest (Falkreath) and The Rift (Riften). I've made nochanges to the Tundra Marsh (Solitude) or the Reach (Markarth) and I will try
to cover these area soon when I have more time to work on them

Models Replaced from UGG

EGrass14 - This model is actually the main model for thegrass you would commonly find in the Pine Forest area

Credits & Special Thanks

Josh Ezzell for the Creator of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?]Unique Grasses andGroundcovers[/url]
Preeum - ESpBlueberry01, ESpBlueberryBush02from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant[/url]
Renthal311 for his clover plant and forestgrass textures
Pfuscher - aspenleafpile01.dds and forestclover_plant.dds from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49661/]4K Parallax Skyrim[/url]
snfkin - angelica06 and willowherb10 textures from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71240/?]Grim Grass[/url]
32cm - trebolgrass,19grassobj, 5grassobj, 47grassobj, 45grassobj and helegrass
textures from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61995/?]Tamriel Reloaded HD[/url]
Bethesda for the Clover model I used for the aspenleafpileand the Reach Bush Model I used for the grasses

Recommended Mods

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9005/?]Landscape Fixes For Grass Mods (32bit versionunder Miscellaneous) by code1k[/url]

Permission

Anyone is freely welcome to improve upon my existing workand you are free to make translations, upload this to other sites, or share
this with anyone you like so long you credit and acquire permission from
each of the original Mod Authors to feature any part this mod in your own mod.[/size][/center]
author: ShadowOfAzura
